page.title: 13INDUSTRY IN PERTH
page.content: Industry in Perth is thriving. This we discovered after a survey along the {Lade,}an inland waterway running under the{City Mills Hotel,}which retained the waterwheel when it was converted from an old mill. This area has a high percentage of city centre industry. Several{builders merchants}and {contractors}have settled along the Lade and they say that despite keeping the workforce down to avoid cutbacks, business is brisk although competion is sometimes hard to beat. Many companies agreed that a smaller workforce enables them to give their employees higher wages and more overtime. { Car repairs}and{tyre services}also figured along the Lade as did a{coach {repairs service}which had only 5 employees, all on overtime.Despite 1 redundancy,business is booming.
